resources.string: Greetings, dear user. We are group of developers-novices from Lviv Politechnic National University (Ukraine). Our group: Rubakha Danylo(talks too much), Atamuratov Edem(poor coder, which was a person, who were given inspiration to whole team), Mykhailiuk Volodymyr(he helped us very much, found some open-source libraries), Andriy Mykytyn(our animator, do not worry, you will not see his animation in this program, at least, while i am typing this) and finally, Pavlo Furd(he is out secret weapon). We are students from CS-105 grop. Thank you for reading this article.
